src_original: dānaṃ gomayambunā ca sahitaṃ śīlaṃ ca sammārjanaṃ
etāḥ pāramitā ṣaḍeva labhate kṛtvā munermaṇḍalam //
namo buddhāya guruve namo dharmāya tāyine /
namaḥ saṃghāya mahate tribhyo 'pi satataṃ namaḥ //
sarvabuddhaṃ namasyāmi dharmaṃ ca jinabhāṣitam /  saṃghaṃ ca śīlasampannaṃ ratnatraya namo 'stu te //
